relation: Input parameter. The ID of the Application Account.
Input parameter. The ID of the Application Instance.
return parameter. A data structure with details about the Application Instance. See "AppInstGroup".
textBeforeTable: Table 6-22 getAppInstGroup(appAccountId, appInstGroupId) Retrieves details about a specific Application Instance. getAppInstGroup Exception N/A CommonException Exception N/A ACCESS_DENIED Return parameter. A list of all Service Application Instance IDs matching the given criteria. Array of xsd:string listAppInstGroupsReturn Input parameter. Indicates which states to filter the result on. See "State" tns1:State state Input parameter. The ID of the Application Account. xsd:string appAccountId Description Type Parameter Name Table 6-21 listAppInstGroups(appAccountId, state) Lists all Application
textAfterTable: getSpAccountSla Deprecated. Use "getSpAccountSlaByType". Note: The new mechanism (getSpAccountSlaByType) adds a parameter, slaType. Requests made using getSpAccountSla have this parameter hardcoded to a value of service_provider. Retrieves the Service Provider SLA of the currently logged in service provider. This operation takes no input parameters. Table 6-23 getSpAccountSla() Parameter Name Type Description getSpAccountSlaReturn xsd:string Return parameter. The Service Provider SLA. ACCESS_DENIED N/A Exception CommonException N/A Exception getSpAccountSlaByType Retrieves an SLA of a given type for the Service Provider Account. Table 6-24 getSpAccountSlaByType(slaType)
